languages.text: "Я видел в снах предзнаменования того, что немногим будет суждено пережить катастрофу. Но мое сердце согрето твоими словами, мон-кай. Приятно знать, что кто-то все-таки выжил".

traits.locale_text: "Я видел со внах предзаменования того, что немногим будет суждено пережить катастрофу. Но мое сердце согрето твоими словами, мон-кай. Приятно знать, что кто-то все-таки выжил".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few would survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know some have survived after all."
languages.original_text: "Я видел в снах предзнаменования того, что немногим будет суждено пережить катастрофу. Но мое сердце согрето твоими словами, мон-кай. Приятно знать, что кто-то все-таки выжил".

traits.locale_text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few were going to survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know someone has survived after all."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few were going to survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know someone has survived after all."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few would survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know some have survived after all."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few would survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know some have survived after all."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few would survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know some have survived after all."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «En mis sueños proféticos vi que muy pocos sobrevivirían a la catástrofe. Pero tus palabras me alegran el corazón, mon-keigh. Me congratula saber que aún viven algunos, después de todo».
languages.original_text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few would survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know some have survived after all."

traits.locale_text: «En mis sueños proféticos vi que muy pocos sobrevivirían a la catástrofe. Pero tus palabras me alegran el corazón, mon-keigh. Me congratula saber que aún viven algunos, después de todo».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「私が見た夢の内容は、災害を生き延びる者はほとんどいないことを告げるものだった。だがお前の言葉で心が温まったぞ、モン＝ケイ。とにかく、生き残った者もいるのを知って、嬉しく思うよ」
languages.original_text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few would survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know some have survived after all."

traits.locale_text: 「私が見た夢の内容は、災害を生き延びる者はほとんどいないことを告げるものだった。だがお前の言葉で心が温まったぞ、モン＝ケイ。とにかく、生き残った者もいるのを知って、嬉しく思うよ」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “我的梦境预示，只有极少数人能在这场灾难中幸存。你的话温暖了我的心，猴子，我很高兴知道真的有人活了下来。”
languages.original_text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few would survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know some have survived after all."

traits.locale_text: “我的梦境预示，只有极少数人能在这场灾难中幸存。你的话温暖了我的心，猴子，我很高兴知道真的有人活了下来。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Certaines choses que j'ai vues dans mes rêves présageaient que peu survivraient au désastre. Mais vos paroles me font chaud au cœur, mon-keigh. C'est un plaisir de savoir que certains ont survécu malgré tout. »
languages.original_text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few would survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know some have survived after all."

traits.locale_text: « Certaines choses que j'ai vues dans mes rêves présageaient que peu survivraient au désastre. Mais vos paroles me font chaud au cœur, mon-keigh. C'est un plaisir de savoir que certains ont survécu malgré tout. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Meine Träume offenbarten mir Sachen, die darauf hindeuteten, dass ein paar wenige die Katastrophe überleben würden. Aber Eure Worte haben mich sehr berührt, Chem-Pan-Sey. Es ist eine Freude zu wissen, dass es Überlebende gibt."
languages.original_text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few would survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know some have survived after all."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Träume offenbarten mir Sachen, die darauf hindeuteten, dass ein paar wenige die Katastrophe überleben würden. Aber Eure Worte haben mich sehr berührt, Chem-Pan-Sey. Es ist eine Freude zu wissen, dass es Überlebende gibt."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Düşlerimde gördüklerim, felaketten sağ kurtulan birilerinin olduğuna delalet etmişti. Sözlerin içimi ısıttı mon-keigh. Her şeye rağmen birilerinin sağ kaldığını bilmek huzur verici."
languages.original_text: "Things I saw in my dreams portended that few would survive the disaster. But your words have warmed my heart, mon-keigh. It is a pleasure to know some have survived after all."

traits.locale_text: "Düşlerimde gördüklerim, felaketten sağ kurtulan birilerinin olduğuna delalet etmişti. Ancak sözlerin içimi ısıttı mon-keigh. Tüm bunlara rağmen birilerinin sağ kaldığını bilmek büyük bir keyif."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
